story:
Into the Rift- The book 

THE STORY: Into the Rift is a rhyming, fictional story. The Takatee family and the Vakatee family do NOT get along. Thanks to an earthquake, a great big rift has opened between them, keeping them apart. All is well, except that same earthquake destroyed their lake, and years later, there's a drought.  One brave little girl and one courageous little boy venture into the rift in search of water, even though they had always been warned not to. They meet, and they discover that they're not so different after all. Maybe if they work together, they can prove to the others that going Into the Rift is the best thing they can all do!

What do people think? "What a masterpiece! For a moment i was transported through a time capsule to the beginning of the Great Rift Valley. This is a true candidate for a Disney animation feature film. Holly you are on the right path. Keep walking, Meanwhile I will take more time to quietly enjoy this piece again."

- William Kimosop, Chief Warden, Into the Rift partner, Baringo, Kenya

As you saw in the video, this is about much more than simply buying a book. This book was written with the support of the people I'm collaborating with in Kenya. Our aim is to fund much bigger projects, like the documentary and web series, which will, in turn, bring awareness, economic growth, and artistic opportunities to the area. 

In order to maximise the amount of money going into the film project, I decided to self-publish. This means paying €3000 up front to print 500 copies of my book. We even have interest from a few schools and organisations who want to sell the book, but of course, we need to print them first! Think of this fundraiser as pre-ordering the book, with added gifts if you're feeling extra generous and believe in what we're doing. If we do not meet our target, you will not be charged.  Any money raised over the target will be added to the documentary fund, helping with airfare, accommodation, equipment, insurance, car rental, and the many other costs involved with a project of this scale.

I am extremely proud of this story, and the Kenyans I'm collaborating with fully approved it and its message, though the situation is purely fictional. As you can see, there is an option available to purchase two books and receive one, with the other book being taken to Kenya. I want to encourage as many people as possible to select this option. It would be wonderful to get to the Rift Valley with a case of books to leave in homes, schools, and organisations as we set off on our adventure. 

The full illustrated preview can be seen in the main video above, and here is a sneak peak into the story:

For more information about the incredible illustrator I collaborated with, please visit http://www.valeriacafagna.com

Into the Rift- the documentary and web series

http://www.intotheriftkenya.com

Our international film crew has been given the opportunity of a lifetime to document and be a part of an extraordinary transition. It is a perfect culmination of right place, right time, right people, and a lot of hard work paying off. Since we are documenting an event, we don't have any time to spare! Things will more forward with or without us, which is why we need your support!

My Dad and my Godfather landed in the rift valley for the first time over 40 years ago, and planted the seed (Well, being Geologists, it was probably a rock) for what would be a lifetime of research, dedication, and international collaboration.

Thanks in large part to their research, and the unwavering dedication of Chief warden, William Kimosop, part of the Rift Valley is about to be protected as a UNESCO Geopark. It's a very big deal, and despite the many setbacks and challenges (It is a rift after all), the time is, at last, drawing near. 

I, together with my amazing film crew, have been invited to document this transition, and to explore and experience the area and the communities as they have never been seen on screen before. Our challenge? This isn't like making a fictional movie. Our story is already underway, whether we are there filming or not. 

This movie will be anything but 'another African documentary'. We are in a very unique position, thanks to my Dad's lifelong relationship with the place and the people. We are neither total outsiders nor insiders. Our connections are enabling a truly mind-blowing list of people who will be interviewed and involved. From a reformed elephant poacher to a governor. Businesswomen and scientists. Organisations, teashop owners, tribal leaders, fishermen, artisans, and everything in between. Our film will show the storytellers and the stories, including our own. Hiking through the Rift Valley with all our equipment is no easy feat.

It is a true collaboration. Are we up for it? Absolutely. 

https://www.eaea.co.ke for more info on the trail!

What do we need?

Organising a project of this scale in Kenya is not easy, and it's truly impossible to do everything involved without being there. We are coordinating with other groups of people, both in Kenya and coming from abroad, and June is the time that seems to work for all of us to come together in the rift. So, we have to get a move on!

By selling 500 copies of the book, we'll be contributing a large chunk to our total goal of €15,000 for our trip in June. This will allow us to:

  • Make a trailer for the feature film, necessary to gain further funding
  • Shoot a Web series, which will focus on both our journey, and feature individuals and organisations in the region, many of whom don't have websites.
  • Start tackling the red tape, and in Kenya, there's a lot of it. 
  • Meet the people needed to get the filming permissions for the main shoot
  • Finalise our budget for the full-length feature
  • Start orchestrating how the hike portion of the film will work (security, accommodation, resources etc)

It will cover the cost of:

  • airfare
  • visas
  • accommodation
  • printing of the Into the Rift book, with a small percent going to the illustrator
  • insurance
  • car rental in Kenya
  • Any additional money raised will go towards filming equipment rental, food, malaria tablets, extra baggage, and our "In Kenya you just never know" fund. 

Risks and challenges

A project of this scale and nature is not a simple undertaking. Along with the general risks of being in Kenya (insects and other wildlife, disease, earthquakes, theft, corruption, political instability, crazy drivers, such delicious fruit that it destroys the taste of all other fruit...) we are somewhat at the mercy of the schedule and happenings in Kenya. Things can change very quickly. We have a plan B and a plan C and a plan D... so the nature of this project might shift as we go, but regardless of what happens, we must go for it. After all, it's called 'Into the Rift' not 'into the easy comfy cushion'. We're ready. We're experienced. And we've got an incredible Kenyan team helping us with every step. 

www.intotheriftkenya.com

Thanks to an earthquake, a great big rift has opened between them, keeping them apart. All is well, except that same earthquake destroyed their lake, and years later, there's a drought.  One brave little girl and one courageous little boy venture into the rift in search of water, even though they had always been warned not to. They meet, and they discover that they're not so different after all. Maybe if they work together, they can prove to the others that going Into the Rift is the best thing they can all do!What do people think? "What a masterpiece! For a moment i was transported through a time capsule to the beginning of the Great Rift Valley. This is a true candidate for a Disney animation feature film. Holly you are on the right path. story:
¿Qué?

El olor de un diamante nos presenta a Rekalde, eterno superviviente, desmbarcando en Cádiz convencido de haber burlado a sus perseguidores.

A través de sus diarios y de entrevistas con personas que lo han conocido, veremos cómo intenta normalizar su vida. Se ve envuelto en una de las mafias de contrabando del Estrecho y se relaciona con los fundamentalistas chechenos refugiados en Bilbao. En una nueva huida, cruza media Europa hasta llegar a Georgia, y por fin a Moscú. Un contrabandista kurdo, dos sicarios colombianos, la milicia nacionalista georgiana, las fuerzas especiales rusas y otros compañeros poco recomendables se van cruzando en su camino maldito, mientras él intenta una y otra vez llegar a su Itaca particular.

¿Quiénes?

Tandaia es una editorial con voluntad de cambio, de publicar obras poco convencionales pero de indudable calidad, con nuevas y refrescantes ideas como es el emplear una campaña preventa para promocionar cada título cuando esta todavía se encuentra en proceso de edición.

De este modo eres tú, ahora que te estás planteando cómo colaborar, el que decide si la obra que te presentamos verá la luz pasando a formar parte de nuestro catálogo... porque consideramos al lector parte fundamental del proceso.

Hoy te presentamos a Arturo Martínez González.

Nacido en Ferrol en 1953, ha dedicado toda su vida laboral al sector naval, residiendo en Madrid y Cartagena, hasta afincarse en Cádiz en 1987. En 2017 ganó el premio El Drag, con el microrrelato «El encargo de Maqroll», y en 2018 volvió a ganar el mismo premio con «Una vez llovió», así como el XXV concurso de narraciones cortas Villa de Torre Pacheco, con el relato «A por pan».

Ha publicado Relatos Indonesios, una recopilación de sus cuadernos de viaje por el archipiélago de la Sonda, y Los cuadernos de Rekalde, su primera novela.

¿Por qué?

Y por aquí una muestra de lo que encontraréis en sus páginas:

«Ayer, cuando la noche se cerró por completo, nos pusimos de nuevo en marcha. Seguimos avanzando por el fondo del valle, cruzamos el campo de fútbol, y al cabo de menos de una hora, Sivam nos dijo que ya estábamos en territorio georgiano.
          Continuamos caminando para alejarnos lo más posible de la línea fronteriza, y con las primeras luces del alba, llegamos a un aprisco de piedra, ubicado en un repecho de la montaña. Allí pasaba los veranos, en casi absoluta soledad, un pastor de cabras y ovejas, claramente amigo de Sivam, que nos ofreció un rincón de la cabaña para descansar y un cuenco de leche recién ordeñada. Asquerosa, casi vomito. Demasiado grasienta para mi gusto.
          Hoy ha amanecido con un frío que nos condensa el aliento y con toda la hierba cubierta de escarcha, lo que hace muy poco aconsejable reanudar la marcha a primera hora, ya que nuestras huellas se quedarían perfectamente dibujadas en la capa blanca que cubre el suelo, y hasta la patrulla de fronteras más cegata las habría detectado.
          Hemos aprovechado el día para descansar, tumbados primero en el interior de la cabaña y luego fuera, conforme el sol iba caldeando el ambiente y derritiendo la escarcha. Mientras tanto, el pastor, hombre de pocas palabras, ha sacado a su rebaño del aprisco y se lo ha llevado a pastar monte arriba, hacia algunos prados sin duda más alimenticios que los matojos secos que puntean este terreno, estepario y pedregoso, sobre el que se levanta la cabaña».

¿Cómo?

Para arrancar el proyecto nos hemos fijado como objetivo 880€; esta es la cantidad que recaudaríamos si alrededor de cincuenta mecenas se hiciesen, cada cual, con un ejemplar de esta primera edición.

  • Teniendo acceso a las galeradas de edición.
  • Recibiendo un ejemplar semanas antes de la salida al mercado de la obra.
  • Si bien, también podrías ver tu nombre en los agradecimientos aportando un poco más.

Aviso para navegantes: La opción BACK IT es únicamente para realizar donaciones a la edición, por lo que no habrá comunicaciones posteriores en busca de datos de envío... cualquiera de las opciones válidas de reserva exige cumplimentar formulario para poder servir el pedido.

Además...

Sabemos que son tiempos difíciles, también nosotros los sufrimos, y es posible que no te encuentres en disposición de apoyarnos con tu mecenazgo en estos momentos... pero esperamos que si esto te ha llegado al alma, incluso si tal vez conoces en persona al autor, trates de difundir esta campaña (facebook, twitter, blogger, boca-oreja... ) para que alcancemos nuestra meta y Arturo Martínez González vea publicada su obra.

Gracias por vuestro tiempo.

Política de Privacidad

story:
Short Summary

I’m Good is a book about living with chronic illness. It highlights stories from my own life, as well as disability influencers, in hopes to guide and inspire those living with chronic illnesses.

My name is Olivia Gaynor and I am the author of I’m Good. I wrote this book because I’ve spent my entire life trying to explain to people what it’s like living with chronic illnesses, but I’ve never gotten the chance to fully explain how these illnesses affect every aspect of my day.

In this book, I hope to instill the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for disability awareness and advocacy in you. And then ultimately I want you to see this book as a tool to help you learn the best ways to help you cope and thrive with chronic illness or if you’re a loved one, the best practices for understanding and interacting with chronically ill people.

In this book, you will learn about a wide range of topics including: 

Mental health & chronic illness - "Yes, This Part is Invisible Too"

Dating while chronically ill - "Love"

Disclosing & explaining diagnoses - "Maybe Being Different Isn't good"

You will love this book if you or someone you know is living with chronic or invisible illnesses, or if you're interested in disability overall. 

I’m Good is a non-fiction book that speaks to chronically ill people and their friends and family who are looking at understanding and coping with chronic illness for the first time.

 

The Book - I'm Good

Part 1 contains the background + first 5 chapters. This first section of the book highlights what it’s like to first get your diagnosis. It follows my early years of being sick and gives a lot of background information that will set up the remaining chapters. I talk about the first time I realized that I was different as well as the emotions that come with a big life change.

Part 2 contains Chapters 6-9. These chapters show what else comes with being chronically ill, whether it be medications or mental health problems. This section shows how mental health and chronic illness are almost inseparable and equally as important.

Part 3 contains Chapters 10-17. This section deals a lot which choices. When you’re living with chronic conditions, often, many things are out of your control. These chapters show my own journey of how I’ve dealt with this burden.

Part 4 contains Chapters 18-21. Here is where I talk about self-advocating and the difficulties that come with being a self-advocate. It’s a struggle to always have to stand up for yourself, and these chapters are where I share this struggle with you. This section also contains the conclusion of the book.

 

What We Need & What You Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in July 2020
  • The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
  • The Copyediting for My Book - to help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this summer of 2020

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish

  • A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
  • Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the Introduction of my Book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
  • I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book

 

About The Author

Olivia Gaynor is a student and disability advocate. She has spent the past 4 years advocating for her needs at school as well as bringing invisible illness awareness through her social media posts. She spoke at Boston Children’s Hospital at a chronic pain clinic for both parents and children. She also completed her honors thesis on Twitter and chronic illness.

It can be really hard to adequately explain to those not experiencing your pain what it’s like. She wants to help people who are struggling to find the right words.

She spends her days when she's not advocating, watching Schitt’s Creek, Parks & Rec and any documentary out there. She also enjoys spending time with her sorority sisters and playing with her service animal, Keller. 

For more information, you can connect with Olivia at olgaynor@mac.com and Olivia.Gaynor on Instagram.

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes it. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family, and network. Please use #ImGood and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page

Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

Thank you so much for all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Olivia

The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
The Copyediting for My Book - to help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this summer of 2020

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish

A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
Early access to the Introduction of my Book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book

 
About The Author
Olivia Gaynor is a student and disability advocate. She has spent the past 4 years advocating for her needs at school as well as bringing invisible illness awareness through her social media posts. She spoke at Boston Children’s Hospital at a chronic pain clinic for both parents and children. She also completed her honors thesis on Twitter and chronic illness.It can be really hard to adequately explain to those not experiencing your pain what it’s like. She wants to help people who are struggling to find the right words.She spends her days when she's not advocating, watching Schitt’s Creek, Parks & Rec and any documentary out there. She also enjoys spending time with her sorority sisters and playing with her service animal, Keller. 
For more information, you can connect with Olivia at olgaynor@mac.com and Olivia.Gaynor on Instagram.
 

Risks & Challenges
The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes it. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship. 

Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:
Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family, and network. Please use #ImGood and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.
You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page
Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.
Thank you so much for all of your love and support!Thanks again,Olivia

story:
Greetings :)

Thanks for stopping by to see what's the deal here ;) I'm working on my second poetry collection: 'RHYME & REASON: Facets of a Life', & I need a little help to maximise my distribution potential.

I am a British writer/poet/screenwriter/actor/director/film maker living in Chicago. I have predominantly been making no budget Indie Horror films for the last ten years under my company name, 'Bloody Brit Productions', but decided to branch out last year & finally publish some of my poetry. My style is very old school; I was raised on rhyming verse & the fun, twisted children's poems of Roald Dahl. In my late teens/early twenties, I formed a rock band & wrote lyrics, [I sang]. As I have matured, so has my writing. I am still very much drawn to rhyme, though I am experimenting a bit more with poetic forms & structure while keeping a lyrical flow.

My first book, 'LOVE is a KILLER', is a horror themed collection about heartbreak, psychos & classic monsters. I self published via Amazon, but mostly sold in person at events. I've had great feedback on this book:

"I enjoy the talent Claire shows in her poetry and the way she has designed her book. I hope she keeps on writing. Poetry, scripts, fiction books."

"Amazingly macabre poetry! The prose was on point and incredibly well written. I enjoyed it immensely!"

"Accessible, relatable, 'Everyman's' poetry. Not for poetry snobs."

This has encouraged me to continue publishing. However, I have exhausted my closest network for sales & need to expand my reach by investing in good marketing, hence this campaign.

The New Book

'RHYME & REASON: Facets of a Life', is a more personal exploration of life in the poetic form. It is split into three categories: 'LIFE', 'LOVE', & 'LAUGHTER', & it expresses a wide range of emotions & situations.

I was reticent at first to publish some of these poems as they may be construed as being negative. However, it can be very cathartic when someone else describes feelings you have had, you know you are not alone, & it was rewarding for me when readers of my first book related to some of my poems. But it's not all doom & gloom, there are some empowering messages thrown in, & of course my humorous, if not twisted, story poems. 

This book will be longer than the first, which is 52 total pages, [technically longer than a chapbook but still a quick read]. However, it will be less than 100 pages, [still currently in writing phase so cannot give final page count]. [Cover art is still in the works.]

The Next Step

Why do I need money to self publish?

The simple answer is: more coverage.

By using a free ISBN from Amazon or the like, as I did with my first book, that limits distribution channels & is deemed by some as unprofessional. For example: Barnes & Nobel & libraries do not carry such titles. Those outlets also require an ISBN for ebooks. I would like to re-publish my first book, in both formats, using a personal ISBN as well as assigning one immediately to my new book.

What do I need?

  • Personal ISBN numbers, barcodes & copyright registration.
  • Membership to Alliance of Independent Authors & Independent Book Publishers Association. They both offer valuable educational tools & discounts on resources.
  • Print a batch of books to take to events, signings & consignment book stores.
  • Marketing. I really need help here.
  • Fulfill campaign perks.
  • Platform & payment processing fees.

What You Get

  • Ebook or PDF copy of either, or both, book[s]
  • Signed physical copy of either, or both book[s]
  • Your name in the acknowledgement section of the new book
  • T-shirts of various designs, including the first book cover art
  • Signed 8x10 photo prints
  • Video poem reading
  • Audio poem reading

 

Risks & Challenges

If I do not meet my goal I will still publish, so there is no risk to you. The amount I raise will determine what distribution outlets will be open to me, thus how much I can expand my reach, & what kind of marketing plan I can execute. By contributing to this campaign you are helping me reach a wider audience.
 
The new book will take priority.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you have already purchased a copy of my first book, 'LOVE is a KILLER', [thank you :)]; you could leave a review on Amazon. https://www.amazon.com/dp/1798690268
  • Share this campaign on your social media sites. Sharing is caring, & appreciated :)

 

THANK YOU for taking the time to read this campaign. I hope you decide to read my poetic offerings.

story:
The Setup

I'm a smart, educated guy who has been as successful in his mid-career job search as Mel Gibson has been at sensitivity.

So, in order to not go thoroughly broke and move back in with my increasingly hard-of-hearing and gassy parents, I realized that I have to rely on my narrow set of talents - writing, humor, cooking, and drinking. What? How is drinking a talent? That's my business.

About a year ago, I invented a crude, crass, and socially apathetic cartoon character named Bastard Squirrel. I even paid a local artist to draw a kind of anthropomorphized dirtbag rodent.

The thoughts expressed in these two paragraphs were largely unrelated until now. I think that Bastard Squirrel might be an interesting brand - in the same way that pain from too much wasabi is kind of good - I don't even know what that means, but both statements are true.

I want to launch a series of books under the Bastard Squirrel (BSq) umbrella. Of course one must start their proverbial day with one. If you start your proverbial day with two, then you should not have eaten such a big meal right before you went to sleep.

The Roll

The first book in the BSq shelf of grey, furry awesomeness is one I have been working on for a few months and merely needs some finishing touches and that extra push. With many DIY projects, it's all about the funding. While lots of recipes, background, and vignettes have been written, no illustrations have been accomplished. That is in part because I draw like Stevie Wonder drives, and I have no money (yet...) to pay for the services of an illustrator.

Then there's the printing of a small run of actual books. While Kindle and e-publishing are intended to be most common means to obtain this future prize winner, it's nice to have a few books for awareness, promotions, and a place to re-home losing scratch off tickets as bookmarks.

Plus, there's a little marketing to be done before it blows up on the internet and becomes the Susan Boyle of, well... boiling.

The following is my estimates for these goodies:


Illustrator: $1,000

Printing - $1,000

Marketing - $1,000

 

I set the goal at $2999 - I'll cover the extra buck. In addition to my considerable financial contribution, I've done all the research writing, and am waiting on the editing (I'll get someone to review, but cheap - from a highly literate friend).

If I do not meet the goal, I can spin down the print run (it's at 333 now), and reduce the marketing. A lot of the marketing was expected to be via social media - and those campaigns can achieve a lot on the cheap - I'm just preparing for a consistent campaign delivered for 90 consecutive days in order to be cohesive and with the best chance of delivering a successful message.

â€¨

The Knockdown

Okay, is the project noble - not really. Is it better than helping a sick person - nah, unless the sick person is an a-hole. Will a Bastard Squirrel cookbook save the world from aliens - yes, yes it will.

The project is valuable to me because it allows me to work on my small dreams while the bigger ones, the ones I trained for, are working themselves out.

The project is valuable because it will probably make you laugh and it might make you into a deceptively good cook. Even if you are already a good cook, you'll still try out one of these heavily researched (really) recipes.

The project is valuable because even if you are a humorless, joyless, Spaghetti-Os eating troglodyte, you can still use the book as a weapon. If you throw Catcher in the Rye at somebody, they'll think there's symbolism in your action - like "read a book and BE someone!" If you throw the Bastard Squirrel Cookbook at the same person, they'll know you're just pissed.

You can trust my integrity because I take all challenges and support seriously. I am intelligent, highly motivated, and have the skills to get the book done and done well. I live by the motto "It's taken me a long time to get to the bottom, and I'm not stopping here."



Even if you can't help financially, just letting someone else know that such hilarious practicality is soon to exist – with the help of you potent social circle – is a huge message and favor. An even huger message and favor is dough, but again, we'll take a mention to your friends. In closing, dough.

story:
'Little Miracle' came about when us five women from Australia, England and the USA came together in 2013 with one thing in common; we had all experienced the life-threatening pregnancy complication, HELLP syndrome. We are blessed that HELLP syndrome did not take our lives or the lives of our children however, some are not as fortunate. We are sharing our story to provide awareness of this traumatic condition so that others know it's signs and symptoms. Furthermore, we have a dream of helping fund research, yet right now we want to spread the word about HELLP and it's impact.


What we have found is that the symptoms associated with HELLP syndrome are varied and more often than not can be dismissed as normal pregnancy symptoms. HELLP syndrome affected us five women and our babies in various ways. Please watch our video to learn how different our stories are and answer this following question; did you know what HELLP syndrome was before perusing our campaign? Unfortunately most are not aware of this traumatic pregnancy complication.


If you're one us, a survivor or you know someone who has been affected by HELLP, you will know all too well that too many people have not heard of it.


The purpose of the 'LITTLE MIRACLE' book is to raise awareness and money to fund even more awareness. 100% of all profits from the sale of 'Little Miracle' will contribute directly to this cause. Since creating our 'Little Miracle: For HELLP Syndrome Awareness' Facebook page in November 2013, we have amassed a large number of followers who all want to see this dream of ours come to fruition. They see the value in this and what spreading the word about HELLP will do. We have people waiting to buy this book, more than we could have ever imagined. This is wonderful as it meets with our overall goal. 'Little Miracle' will be read in more households and therefore, in more conversations than ever before.


This is where you come and this is what we require: 


Initial print run: $ 2,500 

(If we receive more funds from this campaign, we will print more).


If this book makes it to print, we have the ability to make it available worldwide with contacts in Australia, the UK and USA. We also hope to make connections with others in different countries. We will use this book as best we can as a tool to get the attention of pregnant mothers and their families, health professionals, our communities and of course women who have experienced HELLP syndrome as this book will be a beautiful keepsake for them.


We are fortunate to have a tremendous team, all are HELLP survivors who know and understand the importance of this cause.


We thank you for your kindness and support of the 'Little Miracle' book project.

story:
Welcome to The Expeditioners Magazine Fundraising Campaign

Welcome! Bienvenue! Bienvenidos!  We’re delighted that you’re taking a moment to look at our The Expeditioners Online Magazine & Movie campaign. We’ve been openly sharing our lives with you on Facebook for years, and now, we need your support to take our concept to the next level.

We're launching The Expeditioners Online Magazine and creating The Expeditioners first movie!

For those that have spent a moment exploring the world through our images, we ask that you help us spread the word. Ever single dollar, every share, every tweet, and every mention to your friends and family of our project will help us achieve our goal of launching our online magazine and getting our movie proffesionally edited.

Please take a moment to watch the video to get an idea what type of content there will be in the magazine and movie, as well as reading the below to see how you can support us!

Be a part of it! Help us inspire the world!

                                                            Kindly,

                                                            The Expeditioners Roberto & Bella

 The Projects

A.    The Expeditioners Online Magazine (5 editions in 1 year)

B.    Expedition Canada - Ontario, Quebec, BC, Yukon & Northwest Territories

C.    The Expeditioners Movie - Includes Expedition Canada, Iceland, Australia, South Africa, Turks and Caicos, and lots more!

Project Deliverables Include:

1.    Launch & Delivery of The Expeditioners Application & Online Magazine

2.    Photography, Blogging & Updates of 3 month Expedition

3.    Bella Swimsuit Calender OR Expeditioners Nature Calender

4.    Personalized Postcard from Expedition Canada

5.    Digital The Expeditioners Movie to air in Spring 2014

6.    Skype video call with The Expeditioners to talk about adventures!

8.    Your Logo on The Expeditioners Adventure Truck for 6 months!

9.    Advertisements in The Expeditioners First Magazine

10.  Inspire the world.

11.  Photo Tour of Iceland with The Expeditioners for 6 Nights, 7 days

12.  Advertising Banners on www.theexpeditioners.com

13.  Photo Prints

14.  Team Hat with Logo

15.  Photography tour with The Expeditioners in Iceland

 Who We Are

We are Roberto & Bella, a husband and wife team that explores the world like few ever do. We do everything together. Rock-Climbing, Scuba-Diving, Sea-Kayaking, Back-Country Skiing, and lots more! We've been doing it together for 7 years, but it was only three years ago that we began sharing the photographs of our adventures through the use of social media and were happily surprised at people’s fantastic response to our adventures!

It motivated us to keep sharing our photos.

We now reach hundreds of thousands of people per week!

They say a photo speaks a thousand words and so we invite you to get to know us a little on www.facebook.com/expeditioners & www.facebook.com/expeditionersmagazine       

Why This is Important

 The average lifespan in 69.7 years.

 Life is short & there is so much to see in the world! Live it fully!

One of the most rewarding things about what we do are the messages of support that we receive from our fans. People saying that we brighten their day. That we inspire them to travel. To explore. To live! For those unable to travel-- they send us notes and messages saying that they live vicariously through us!

We know that these things are unquantifiable, but that doesn’t make them any less valuable. Help us spread the vibe--help us inspire the world!

Why we need your support

We are not paid to do what we do. We do it because we love to. We do it because you only live once. We do it to inspire others to live their lives to the fullest.

We’ve always found a way to continue on our extreme globetrotting adventures, but now we need YOUR HELP to maximize the sharing of those adventures with you. The Expeditioners Magazine & Movie is the conduit of our adventures and experiences to you.

We’ve finished the magazine, but now we need to launch it via our new Application online and it’s going to cost us $6000. We've got a part of it and need your help for the rest!

Once we have the application, we wil be able to reach you anywhere in the world as long as you have a smartphone or computer.

Support us by getting The Expeditioners MAGAZINE - You get a 1-Year Subscription! 4 Editions + 1 GearGuide = 5 digital magazines!

The principal reason for all our fundraising is to be able to launch our online Magazine. We have some amazing stories to tell, photos to share, and travel and gear advice to give. This magazine will be a platform for many great things to come! Be a part of it! By supporting us with $25 for your subscription to our online magazine-- you are subscribing to The Expeditioners first 5 online magazines! Discover the world with us.

Check-out the amazing sponsors we have worked with up to now here: http://theexpeditioners.com/our-sponsors/


What you will find in The Expeditioners Magazine

1. The stories! - Read about Roberto & Bella's adventures and misadventures alike!

2. Gear Guide - We are avid gear lovers! And we really take our stuff through ALL conditions!

3. Exclusive Photos - We're keeping some of our best shots for magazine! From kayaking in Iceland, to Shark Cage Diving, to camping the most remote regions of the world! The best of it all will be in the mag!

4. Adventure Photo Guide: Learn about what photography kit we use, and how we use it in "Adventure Photo Guide"

5. Bella - She is an incerdible woman. Find out her feelings behind the adventures, what it's like to be a woman in the wild-- and an exclusive guide to her favourite clothes, gear, and swimwear;)

6. Destinations - Find out where the most amazing places in the world to travel are. We've knocked off over 30 countries-- many more than once- and we've learned where to go and why, and now we're going to be sharing it with you!

PREVIEW ONE OF OUR FEATURE ARTICLES IN THE EXPEDITIONERS MAGAZINE IN OUR GALLERY OR at www.theexpeditioners.com

 Expedition Canada

In a few weeks we depart for an epic adventure across Canada. We’ll be canoeing, camping, kayaking, biking, climbing and even surfing on the way. We’ll be driving over 5000km to get to the Northwest Territories wild. Adventure will follow adventure as we cross our spectacular country.

You have the opportunity to have your LOGO on our truck or trailer for the entire adventure! Reach hundreds of thousands of Canadians with it!

Welcome to The Expeditioners Magazine Fundraising Campaign
Welcome! Bienvenue! Bienvenidos!  We’re delighted that you’re taking a moment to look at our The Expeditioners Online Magazine & Movie campaign. We’ve been openly sharing our lives with you on Facebook for years, and now, we need your support to take our concept to the next level.
We're launching The Expeditioners Online Magazine and creating The Expeditioners first movie!
For those that have spent a moment exploring the world through our images, we ask that you help us spread the word. Ever single dollar, every share, every tweet, and every mention to your friends and family of our project will help us achieve our goal of launching our online magazine and getting our movie proffesionally edited.
Please take a moment to watch the video to get an idea what type of content there will be in the magazine and movie, as well as reading the below to see how you can support us!
Be a part of it! Help us inspire the world!
                                                            Kindly,
                                                            The Expeditioners Roberto & Bella
 The Projects
A.    The Expeditioners Online Magazine (5 editions in 1 year)
B.    Expedition Canada - Ontario, Quebec, BC, Yukon & Northwest Territories
C.    The Expeditioners Movie - Includes Expedition Canada, Iceland, Australia, South Africa, Turks and Caicos, and lots more!
Project Deliverables Include:
1.    Launch & Delivery of The Expeditioners Application & Online Magazine
2.    Photography, Blogging & Updates of 3 month Expedition
3.    Bella Swimsuit Calender OR Expeditioners Nature Calender
4.    Personalized Postcard from Expedition Canada
5.    Digital The Expeditioners Movie to air in Spring 2014
6.    Skype video call with The Expeditioners to talk about adventures!
8.    Your Logo on The Expeditioners Adventure Truck for 6 months!
9.    Advertisements in The Expeditioners First Magazine
10.  Inspire the world.

12.  Advertising Banners on www.theexpeditioners.com
13.  Photo Prints 
14.  Team Hat with Logo
15.  Photography tour with The Expeditioners in Iceland
 Who We Are
We are Roberto & Bella, a husband and wife team that explores the world like few ever do. We do everything together. Rock-Climbing, Scuba-Diving, Sea-Kayaking, Back-Country Skiing, and lots more! We've been doing it together for 7 years, but it was only three years ago that we began sharing the photographs of our adventures through the use of social media and were happily surprised at people’s fantastic response to our adventures!
It motivated us to keep sharing our photos.
We now reach hundreds of thousands of people per week!
They say a photo speaks a thousand words and so we invite you to get to know us a little on www.facebook.com/expeditioners & www.facebook.com/expeditionersmagazine       
Why This is Important
 The average lifespan in 69.7 years.
 Life is short & there is so much to see in the world! Live it fully!
One of the most rewarding things about what we do are the messages of support that we receive from our fans. People saying that we brighten their day. That we inspire them to travel. To explore. To live! For those unable to travel-- they send us notes and messages saying that they live vicariously through us!
We know that these things are unquantifiable, but that doesn’t make them any less valuable. Help us spread the vibe--help us inspire the world!
Why we need your support
We are not paid to do what we do. We do it because we love to. We do it because you only live once. We do it to inspire others to live their lives to the fullest.
We’ve always found a way to continue on our extreme globetrotting adventures, but now we need YOUR HELP to maximize the sharing of those adventures with you. The Expeditioners Magazine & Movie is the conduit of our adventures and experiences to you.
We’ve finished the magazine, but now we need to launch it via our new Application online and it’s going to cost us $6000. We've got a part of it and need your help for the rest!
Once we have the application, we wil be able to reach you anywhere in the world as long as you have a smartphone or computer.
Support us by getting The Expeditioners MAGAZINE - You get a 1-Year Subscription! 4 Editions + 1 GearGuide = 5 digital magazines! 
The principal reason for all our fundraising is to be able to launch our online Magazine. We have some amazing stories to tell, photos to share, and travel and gear advice to give. This magazine will be a platform for many great things to come! Be a part of it! By supporting us with $25 for your subscription to our online magazine-- you are subscribing to The Expeditioners first 5 online magazines! Discover the world with us. 
Check-out the amazing sponsors we have worked with up to now here: http://theexpeditioners.com/our-sponsors/
What you will find in The Expeditioners Magazine
1. The stories! - Read about Roberto & Bella's adventures and misadventures alike!
2. Gear Guide - We are avid gear lovers! And we really take our stuff through ALL conditions!
3. Exclusive Photos - We're keeping some of our best shots for magazine! From kayaking in Iceland, to Shark Cage Diving, to camping the most remote regions of the world! The best of it all will be in the mag!
4. Adventure Photo Guide: Learn about what photography kit we use, and how we use it in "Adventure Photo Guide"
5. Bella - She is an incerdible woman. Find out her feelings behind the adventures, what it's like to be a woman in the wild-- and an exclusive guide to her favourite clothes, gear, and swimwear;)
6. Destinations - Find out where the most amazing places in the world to travel are. We've knocked off over 30 countries-- many more than once- and we've learned where to go and why, and now we're going to be sharing it with you!

Le trésor de La Buse 

ENGLISH BELOW

Réunionnais d'origine, je vis à saint denis de la Réunion, j'ai 34 ans, marié et père de deux garçons.

Salarié dans une grande entreprise de l'île (une banque, pas très passionant comme métier), je me suis pris de passion pour les histoires de pirates, leurs trésors, et plus particulèrement celui d'Olivier Levasseur dit "La Buse".

Enterré quelque part sur une île de l'océan indien en 1721, ce butin vient du pillage du "Nossa Senhroa do Cabo", navire amiral de la flotte portugaise, ammaré au large de saint denis de la Réunion. On parle de 5 tonneaux de pièces d'or, d'une cassette de diamants et de lingots d'or, mais principalement de la croix de Goa. 

De nombreux chercheurs de trésor se sont cassés les dents en le recherchant, certains y ont passé leur vie, d'autres se sont suicidés (Bibique 1995). Les recherches ont pris un coup d'accélérateur en 2014 avec les travaux de Mézino sur le cryptogramme de La Buse : document que le pirate a jeté à la foule au pied de l'échafaud sur lequel il a été pendu en 1730, et qui indique l'emplacement de son magot.

Il est aujoud'hui certain que le trésor se trouve à la Réunion.

J'ai réalisé une nouvelle traduction du cryptogramme, dont le langage est un mélange de vieux français, d'occitan, de vieux provencal et d'ancien créole. Le texte représente une suite d'éléments de navigation se basant sur les constellations visibles dans l'hémisphère sud et amenant à l'île de la Réunion (22° sud, 55.3°E).

Les travaux sur les points "supplémentaires" du cryptogramme permettent de faire ressortir une carte, en lien avec la célèbre phrase de La Buse sur le chemin de la potence (vers Saint Paul) : " avec tout ce que j'ai enterré là, je pourrais acheter l'île". Je garde bien entendu le détail de la zone de recherche que j'ai établi.

Je fais appel à votre participation pour m'aider à m'équiper et financer 1 an de recherche : radar de sol, détecteur à impulsion électromagnétique, détecteur de métaux, survol en hélicoptère, matériel de recherche de grotte.

La moitié de ce qui sera trouvé, ira à l'Etat, le reste sera partagé comme suit : 

1/4 pour moi et mon équipe.

1/4 pour les co-financeurs.

une estimation faite à l'aide du testament de Nagéon de l'Estang dit "butin", montre que le trésor aurait une valeur de plus de 4 Milliards d'euros, ça fait rêver ... 

A ce jour j'ai commencé la prospection sur zone, mais avec du trop petit matériel, et sur quelques heures par semaine. Votre soutien financier me permettra de mettre en place une équipe de 2 personnes à temps plein.

Risques et défi

Comme toute chasse au trésor, le succès n'est pas garanti. Mais le trésor de La Buse fait partie des 10 trésors légendaires encore existants.


The treasure of the Tube

From Reunion Island, I live in saint denis Reunion, I'm 34, married and father of two boys.

Employee in a large company of the island (a bank, not very exciting), I developed a passion for the stories of pirates, their treasures, specially the one of Olivier Levasseur "La Buse".

Buried somewhere on an island in the Indian Ocean in 1721, it comes from the pillaging of booty "Nossa Senhroa do Cabo ', flagship of the Portuguese fleet, docked in Saint Denis Reunion. We talk about 5 barrels of gold, a safe of diamonds and gold bars, but mainly the gold cross of Goa.

Many treasure hunters have broken their teeth by searching, some spent their lives, others committed suicide (Bibique 1995). The search has been boosted in 2014 with the work of Mezino on the cryptogram of la Buse: document that the pirate threw to the crowd at the bottom of the scaffold on which he was hanged in 1730, and indicates the location of his treasure.

It is, today, sure the treasure is on Reunion Island.

I made a new translation of the cryptogram, whose language is a mixture of old French, Occitan, Provencal old and old Creole. The text represents a sequence of navigation elements based on the constellations visible in the southern hemisphere and bringing the Reunion Island (22 ° S, 55.3 ° E).

Work on the willingly  added points on the cryptogram serve to highlight a map, in connection with the famous words of la Buse on the way to the gallows (to St. Paul): "with all that I buried, I could buy the island ". I keep detailed on the search area that I established, of course.

I appeal to your participation to help me to equip myself and fund one year of research: ground radar, electromagnetic pulse detector, metal detector, helicopter, and cave research material.

Half of which will be found, will go to the French State, the rest will be shared as follows:

1/4 for me and my team.

1/4 for co-financiers.

An estimate made using the testament of Nageon del’Estang called "Butin", shows that the treasure would have a value of over 4 billion euros, what a dream ...

By now I started prospecting in the area, but with too little equipment and few hours a week. Your financial support will allow me to set up a team of two full-time staff.

Risks and challenges

Like any treasure hunt, success is not guaranteed. But the treasure of la Buse is one of 10 surviving legendary treasures.

story:
Introducing: Spring Spring, is a practical journal from the team behind Ethos magazine.

Featuring inspiring, information-packed interviews from some of the world’s most successful business leaders, freelancers and entrepreneurs – Spring isn’t designed to tell you what to do; it’s been created to inspire and encourage. We’re sharing the stories of those who have been there; done that.

Not a guidebook; not a rulebook – this journal is designed for you, and your personal discovery and development – whether that’s in life or work.

Spring showcases creators, authors, designers, journalists, app builders, wellbeing experts, and more, and asks: How did they get to where they are today? What would they do differently, if they could? How did they tackle the challenges that they faced along the way? Each of them revealing things they've done and discovered for themselves; born out of lived experience.

Spring's introduction comes from Mark Shayler, author of Do Disrupt, and founder of environmental and innovation agency, Ape. Mark has worked with hundreds of businesses big and small, to develop new business models, and new ways of thinking.

We've interviewed: Cyrill Gutsch, founder of Parley for the Oceans, the environmental organisation tackling our ocean plastic problem; Alexandra Heminsley, journalist, broadcaster and award-winning author of Running Like a Girl; Marc Champagne, cofounder of reflection app Kyō; Ngozi Weller wellness expert at Aurora Wellness; Matt 'Mills' Miller, cofounder of ustwo; Rosa Park, editor in chief of Cereal magazine; and many more...

Alongside our interviews, we have designed tools, tips, and tricks to point you in the right direction, and a 28-day journal to help you along the way.

Our journal focuses on nine key themes:

Each of our nine themes will guide you through Spring and are broken down into an introduction; an interview to bring the theme to life; and a set of tools and tasks to help you get going.

In today’s fast-paced, technology-driven world, our lives are often clouded by outside perspectives and views, and we’ve lost touch with our own voice along the way. Keeping a journal is the best way to stay true to your own voice. We know that journaling is effective – because we do it ourselves.

Why have we chosen a 28-day journal? Because it takes 28 days to form a habit. And what better habit to form, than getting to know yourself, again?

We need your help, to bring Spring to life.

 

What we need – what you get

We’re asking for £6,000 to fund Spring. The money will go towards the design, production, and print of our journal. In return, you’ll receive a beautifully designed, and thought out journal. Spring has been designed with reader experience in mind; it will be a clear, easy to use, calming space, which is both interactive and designed to be scribbled in and personalised.

144 pages of loveliness printed sustainably on recyclable paper, with vegetable-based ink – the only eco-conscious alternative to traditional petrol-based inks.

To bolster our crowdfunder, we’ve teamed up with industry leaders, to bring you a range of unique perks. We’re offering tickets for the School of Life's Get to Know Yourself in a Day workshop; tickets to Ethos Explores, a collaborative workshop series which gets you in front of industry experts, who will help you to take your next steps. We've got Ethos subscriptions, totes, posters and prints. And a whole lot more...

 

Who we are, and why it’s important

 

The team

We’ve been down the crowdfunding path before, successfully crowdfunding the first issues of Ethos magazine, back in 2016. And, what we discovered is that not only did we get the funds to print our magazine, but we built our very own community, which has been imperative to the success of Ethos along the way. Ethos lives to tell the stories of human interaction; of community; the stories of people power. Spring is no different. By funding our journal, you will be forever woven into the fabric of our story.

Today, we have eight issues of Ethos under our belts, alongside a successful website; and, our team has been running businesses collectively for over 20 years. We have lived the themes in our journal, and have come out the other side with tools, tips, and tricks to pass on to those starting out, or the people wanting to change track.

Spring bridges the gap between the amazing stories that we tell through Ethos, and the people on the ground, who want to start their own amazing journey, but might need that extra inspiration to make it happen.

Setting up a business is quick. But, an enormous amount of businesses fail and cease to exist, because people give up on their ideas at the first hurdle. Spring is about getting on with it; picking yourself back up; it’s a coping mechanism for the challenges of every day; it’s learning how to make failure work for you. If you never fail, nothing ever changes.

In the old economy, many businesses focused on sales and marketing, balance sheets and forecasts – but, not a lot of people are taught how to be resilient. Resilience is different from being tough; resilience allows you to be aware of your vulnerabilities – and vulnerability is valued in the new, human economy.

Spring brings the tools to make you more resilient in business, and in life. A set of tools that are more essential than ever before…

 

Risks and challenges

 

Crowdfunding comes with risks and challenges; it's all about stepping into the unknown – but that's what makes it exciting. What if we don't meet our £6,000 target? Well, our journal has already been written and tested – so, we can simply print fewer copies for less money.

We've worked in publishing and media for over 20 years, and we already successfully produce and print Ethos magazine each quarter, so we've got any production issues that might arise, covered.

 

Other ways you can bring Spring to life

 

Tell people about Spring. As we've mentioned previously, Spring will be built on the power of our community; so, if you're not able to fund us, but you know somebody who would love a copy – tell them. Share us on social media; sing about us (loudly enough) in the shower; speak about us to strangers in the street...

We’re offering tickets for the School of Life's Get to Know Yourself in a Day workshop; tickets to Ethos Explores, a collaborative workshop series which gets you in front of industry experts, who will help you to take your next steps. We've got Ethos subscriptions, totes, posters and prints. And a whole lot more... Who we are, and why it’s important The teamWe’ve been down the crowdfunding path before, successfully crowdfunding the first issues of Ethos magazine, back in 2016. And, what we discovered is that not only did we get the funds to print our magazine, but we built our very own community, which has been imperative to the success of Ethos along the way. Ethos lives to tell the stories of human interaction; of community; the stories of people power. Spring is no different. By funding our journal, you will be forever woven into the fabric of our story.Today, we have eight issues of Ethos under our belts, alongside a successful website; and, our team has been running businesses collectively for over 20 years. We have lived the themes in our journal, and have come out the other side with tools, tips, and tricks to pass on to those starting out, or the people wanting to change track.Spring bridges the gap between the amazing stories that we tell through Ethos, and the people on the ground, who want to start their own amazing journey, but might need that extra inspiration to make it happen.Setting up a business is quick. But, an enormous amount of businesses fail and cease to exist, because people give up on their ideas at the first hurdle. Spring is about getting on with it; picking yourself back up; it’s a coping mechanism for the challenges of every day; it’s learning how to make failure work for you. If you never fail, nothing ever changes.In the old economy, many businesses focused on sales and marketing, balance sheets and forecasts – but, not a lot of people are taught how to be resilient. Resilience is different from being tough; resilience allows you to be aware of your vulnerabilities – and vulnerability is valued in the new, human economy.Spring brings the tools to make you more resilient in business, and in life. A set of tools that are more essential than ever before… Risks and challenges Crowdfunding comes with risks and challenges; it's all about stepping into the unknown – but that's what makes it exciting. What if we don't meet our £6,000 target? Well, our journal has already been written and tested – so, we can simply print fewer copies for less money.We've worked in publishing and media for over 20 years, and we already successfully produce and print Ethos magazine each quarter, so we've got any production issues that might arise, covered. Other ways you can bring Spring to life Tell people about Spring. As we've mentioned previously, Spring will be built on the power of our community; so, if you're not able to fund us, but you know somebody who would love a copy – tell them. Share us on social media; sing about us (loudly enough) in the shower; speak about us to strangers in the street...

story:
Video Unboxing

Thanks to Jennifer Ball who does a good job at describing how to use the card fronts with the card backs.
 

With the newly printed cards in, this deck has also been unpublished from makeplayingcards.com . 

This 72 card oracle deck was created to focus on a nature-based and healing theme. Once the manual is created, it will contain definitions on how to use the cards to not only give a general oracle reading, but to read the collective energy as well. Some samples of the cards are below:

The cards are divided into suits with 8 cards in each suit. The suits are air, earth, fire, ice, water, purification, spiritual hygiene, healing, and technology. The images for the cards were extended licenses purchased through Fotolia and Dreamstime.
 

The cards are currently available online through a divination website application. 


 

***Note: I've made a few changes since doing the first print run due to learning more about environmental options available, quality, guilding and other factors. ***

The book I'm now having printed through Ingram Spark (an environmental print-on-demand service). The box is created out of recycled paperboard.

 

Some of the qualities of this oracle deck might be hard to find in a regular angel card, tarot, or oracle deck, For example:

  • This oracle deck has 9 suits of 8 cards each creating a deck of 72 cards
  • The suits are earth, fire, water, air, ice (to cover various environmental situations) and healing, purification, technology, and spiritual hygiene (to cover other important aspects of he world that affect our personal and collective health and well-being).
  • This oracle deck will allow those using it to read the collective energy rather than simply focusing on their personal life alone. This helps with seeing the bigger picture and the impact being made or what steps we can take to be part of healing the collective energy.

 

Shipping as a small business, shipping costs can be quite high, especially if asking for tracking on packages. I apologize for this and hope to at a later date offer the deck through a fulfillment center with cheaper shipping costs.  Located in Canada, shipping charges to US are about 18$ per package with tracking for a small packet (the cards and book without the box) and over 20$ with the box included. Within Canada, the price can also go up to 18$ with tax included. International charges are 22-25$ per package, untrackable (since trackable is 44$).

 

EFT Divination & Chakra Deck (Part of the EFT Divination Kit)

Color of Love Deck (Part of the Color of Love Divination Kit)

Find the two kits at https://www.thegamecrafter.com/designers/emerald-house-publishing

story:
Short Summary

82 year old author, grandmother and victim of the credit crunch Anne J. Steinberg has written eight novels and her dream is to publish all of them online.

Her first novel "Manroot" was listed for the prize "Fiction Without Frontiers" with six other prestigious authors including Margaret Atwood. "Manroot" is about a Native American healer and was recently published on Amazon as an e-book. The novel has over 59 - 5 star reviews and 33 - four star reviews. Reviewers wrote "I wish it would have lasted longer and was saddened when it came to an end. 5 Stars and cannot wait to see what Author Anne J. Steinberg comes up with next!"

In 2008 Anne lost most of her money in the stock market disaster and fell on some hard times. It has been her lifelong dream to be able to publish all of her novels online. So far she has published five of them on Amazon and wants to publish the other three as well.

But Anne doesn't have the funds to publish these three novels because they still need to be typed out and formatted. She is looking to raise funds to pay for a typist to type her books and a graphic artist to design the covers. She also would like to buy a computer with voice recognition software so she can begin working on some new novels she plans on writing as well as turning her novels "Manroot" and "Cuckoo's Gift" into screenplays.

It is her dream for the world be able to read her books but at 82, in a technological age - it has become very difficult to achieve this. We need your help!

What We Need & What You Get

Anne is looking to raise $10,000 to achieve her dream of releasing all her books into the world. She plans to spend the money in the following ways;

$2000 - to pay for a typist to type her three unpublished novels.

$2000 - for three new covers designed for her novels by a graphic artist.

$2500 - will go to buying a new Apple computer with voice activated typing so she can continue to write new novels. This would also include a new printer.

$3000 - will go to advertising and publicizing all of the eight novels online such as through Book Bub, Kindle Nation and Goodreads. It will also go towards getting the book on other platforms.

$500 - go to entry fees for various legitimate book and screenplay competitions like The Nicholl Fellowship and Final Draft. These funds will also go to purchasing screenwriting software.

We have several unique perks for the campaign. A $5 contribution will allow you to get a free e-book PDF of Anne J. Steinberg's novel "Manroot".

A $20 contribution will allow you to receive PDFs of Anne Steinberg's novels "Manroot", "A Cuckoos' Gift", "First Hands" & "Every Town Needs a Russian Tea Room."

The Impact

Anne's life as a novelist will be changed dramatically by being able to have the tools to pursue her dreams. She has faced great challenges in her life including losing a lot of her money in the stock market crash and having setbacks with her career. This funding could finally release her whole collected works online, for everyone to read. At the end of the day - you are supporting a novelist who writes about social causes such as women's rights and the plight of the native American people. Plus you will be making an old woman very happy!

Here are the Amazon links to two of Anne J. Steinberg's novels

http://www.amazon.com/Manroot-Anne-Steinberg-ebook/dp/B00J1BPZJA/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1425942154&sr=8-1&keywords=manroot

http://www.amazon.com/Every-Town-Needs-Russian-Room-ebook/dp/B00JKNZVDE/ref=sr_1_4?s=digital-text&ie=UTF8&qid=1425942210&sr=1-4

StepJeriTai Media LLC is a startup publishing company specializing in producing books for retail outlets and music and art for commission or sale. In September of 2015, we are introducing the first wave of our products in the form of the book ‘Finding Your Light Book One: Relevance at Work’. This book dissects the myths surrounding professional development and personal marketability, while helping readers uncover their personal potential. There are seven (7) other books to follow, which include:

o Finding Your Light Book Two: Creative Culture (2016)

o Finding Your Light Book Three: The Earth-Typed Mind (2017)

o Finding Your Light Book Four: Political Prowess (2018)

o Finding Your Light Book Five: Your Spiritual Stance (2019)

o Finding Your Light Book Six: Of Family and Friends (2020)

o Finding Your Light Book Seven: On Love and Loss (2021)

o Finding Your Light Book Eight: Dream of a World United (2022)

The release of ‘Finding Your Light Book One: Relevance at Work’ will include an adjacent release of our website, www.findingyourlight.net, and a soon to follow mobile application. The website will be in a blog format, with tabs to match each topic covered within editions. The market for the book is upstart individuals, small to medium sized businesses, and the self-help segment. I am seeking funding to pay for publishing costs of the first two books and the web site and app launch.

story:
LAINOVA introduces the Straight Pen, the pen re-designed for precision. With a dual pen design, one side of the Straight Pen operates like a normal pen. The other side offers a wheel guide to draw perfect lines whether straight or curved. Evolve your writing, drawing, and outlining with the Straight Pen. 

 

The Straight Pen offers two pens in one. The writing side can be used as a normal 0.5 mm pen for writing, drawing or your personal signature. Use this side of the straight pen for more free form lines to allow your personal writing nuances  to come alive.

The line-drawing side of Straight Pen, can be used to draw lines both straight and curved. The pen-feel provided by the guiding wheels offers unparalleled control of your writing tool.  Press lightly down and the wheels will guide your pen to create more uniform and symmetrical lines. 

When you give equal pressure to both wheels, you can easily draw a perfect STRAIGHT LINE, both vertical or horizontal. If you give varying pressure to the wheels, they will guide you in drawing a CURVED LINE. Find the perfect line with Straight pen. 

 

 

 

With any pen, control is paramount. With Straight Pen, not only can you control the direction of the line, you can also control where the line starts and stops. The pen lead within Straight Pen is spring loaded allowing the user to stop marking by simply releasing  pressure on the pen. Slips of the hand won't leave stray marks because without steady pressure the spring will automatically recoil the pen lead back upwards. 

 

The wheel guides on Straight Pen are set at a negative camber for maximum contact with the surface, thereby allowing for more grip feel or control. The same concept is applied to race cars, where a negative camber sacrifices straight line acceleration for more control on turns. This wheel alignment provides more pen-feel or feedback, which allows you to feel the movements of Straight Pen with more sensitivity.

Whether drawing straight or curved, feel the line with Straight Pen!
 

 

 

Studying

As a student, keeping your thoughts and notes organized are the first step to effective studying. When drawing diagrams, graphs or charts, Straight Pen can help you create more symmetrical and precise designs. Straight Pen also covers your highlighting needs with neat lines to catch your attention when you return to reading material. Develop effective study habits with Straight Pen.

 

Drawing & Mapping

For those who draw, including interior designers and architects, Straight Pen offers straight lines without rulers.  Whether mapping out the interior of a house, drawing a straight line to mark the placement of nails, or using line shading to give your drawings perspective, Straight Pen provides the guidelines to a more organized and impactful drawing. 

 

Play

Then, there are those of us who love to doodle & play. Millions of games can be played with just pen and paper. Whether engaging in a game of Tic-tac-toe, Hangman or Boxes Straight Pen can provide hours of fun. 

 

 

 

The Straight Pen offers all standard pen colors. The writing side of Straight Pen comes in Black ink. The line drawing side of Straight Pen is available in Red, Blue and Black.  

 

 

 

 

 

 

Straight Pen Standard  - 1 Straight Pen (Plastic Body)

 


Straight Pen Premium - Packaging + Tutorial + Ink Refill + 1 Straight Pen (Silicon Plastic Body)

 

 

 

 

 

 

LAINOVA stands for Line + Innovation + Value. We at LAINOVA believe that to change the world, you must start with the right tools. Our hope is that small changes towards making life more effective can help you unlock your dreams, whatever they may be.

UPDATE!!!! You can now read the first five chapters on scribbledvictims.com! I hope you love it!

 

Summary

Hello, my name is Robert Tomoguchi and I began writing when I was 13 years old. Over the years I've written many poems, stage plays, screenplays, a fairytale, and four novellas. It has always been my goal to become a novelist and after two years of relentless work, I finally finished writing my first full length novel and plan to release it by early December 2016. 

I created this campaign in order to pre-sell the book to raise money to help cover the costs of publication and promotion. This includes typesetting, book design, cover design, and promotion. 

I'm hoping this book might help launch a professional career for me as a writer, so that I can devote all my time creating new stories. My favorite thing about my pre-sale is that contributors will be able to read this book that I am so proud of. 

What is the Book About?

The Scribbled Victims tells the story of Yelena Solodnikova, a vampire who developed a conscience, and therefore struggles with the guilt of her murderous eternal existence. She finds solace in the company of Orly Bialek, a twelve-year-old girl who is dying of cancer. Through her art, Orly can see the evil deeds committed by the people she scribbles. These scribbles provide Yelena with victims she will not feel guilty for killing. It seems like a perfect relationship, except that Orly’s cancer will soon take her life. Yelena must decide between letting Orly die and returning to her own eternity of guilt, or making her immortal by condemning her to the loveless life of a child vampire.

Yes, my debut novel is a vampire novel, but this book is much more than that. It is about different kinds of love and the bonds that form between people. 

What I Need & What You Get

  • I created a spreadsheet that added up the costs of book publication and promotion and it came to $2,261.20.
  • The money contributed will go towards production and publication costs including: typesetting, book design, and cover design. It will also help promote the book by launching a brand new website for the book, and to pay the fees to three companies who will help promote the book to their audience, reviewers, and libraries.  
  • Contributors to my campaign will be able to read the book in either paperback or in eBook format, but they will also have their name published in the Acknowledgements section at the end of the book so that their generosity and support will always be recognized. 
  • If my goal is not achieved then whatever funds raised will go first to the production and publication of the book so that all contributors will be guaranteed a copy. If the entire goal is not reached then it will result in less or delayed book promotion. 

The Impact

Your contribution will not only help me further my goal of becoming a full time writer, but it will also help circulate a new novel that I am certain readers will enjoy and even make non-readers excited about reading. 

I have done two successful pre-sales before to promote my last two novellas in the Me and My Friend Maddie Gothic Book Series, and the assistance was invaluable. Both books were well received by readers. But this book is more than twice the length of those books and will appeal to a much wider audience.

Other Ways You Can Help

No donation amount is too small but if you want to support the book and are unable to make a monetary contribution you can still help by sharing this campaign and telling others about the book which will come out by early December. You can even use the IndieGoGo share tools!

story:
Summary

Men want more out of their lives. They want better relationships, deeper intimacy, a richer connection to their purpose, amazing sex, love, and a powerful reason to get out of bed in the morning.

The world is making it harder to be such a man. We are seeing more isolation, higher divorce rates, more adults being single than in couples, and a malaise of "Why bother" permeating the culture.

It's not getting better. It's actually getting worse.

Let's do something about it.

My name is Robert Kandell and I've been an educator in intimacy, interpersonal relationships, and communication for 18 years. I am submitting a book proposal to Hay House as part of their writers conference contest on October 9th, 2017.

I need your help bolstering my platform to make my proposal the richest it can be. Every email, subscriber, and follower helps! My goals are:

  • Add 5000 new people to my email list.
  • Gain 2000 subscribers to my podcast, Tuff Love.
  • Get 5000 new LIKES to my FB Professional Page.

I only do ONE email/week that I believe is entertaining and educational. I promise not to bombard your email account.

Why should you help?

In my 18 year tenure of educating singles and couples, I've seen the challenges that all genders are going through living in the 21st century. Our world is evolving fast and many people feel lost in the wake of these changes. For men, the world has become a very challenging place.

In my upcoming book unHIDDEN, I will creating a guide for men on how to know their place in the world. I will first define how the world encourages you to live HIDDEN (i.e. inauthentic) and not show the beauty of your true self.

Next, I will describe pragmatic ways for a man to confront his own self-imposed limitations and live REAL in the world. Section III will be about the changes of a man's dating life, how the technology and the changing workforce has altered many of the rules and how to successfully interact and succeed with a modern woman.

Finally, the last section is about how a man can find his purpose in today's world.

Be a part of helping this book come to life by helping me build my platform. Help others who feel lost and are looking for resources.

Where the money will go

I want to be transparent about the funds collected. I wish I could charge $0 for the email addresses but Indiegogo has its requirements. The money collected will go to:

  • Hiring a marketing team to help me sell the book
  • Creating new "how-to" videos

Other Ways You Can Help

If adding your name is not your fancy, you can help by:

  • Sharing this campaign to your social media feeds
  • Telling a friend about the campaign
  • Do some anonymous good in the world

And that's all there is to it.
